text: وَإِذْ قَالَ إِبْرَٰهِيمُ لِأَبِيهِ وَقَوْمِهِۦٓ إِنَّنِى بَرَآءٌ مِّمَّا تَعْبُدُونَ

translation.en.sahih: And [mention, O Muhammad], when Abraham said to his father and his people, "Indeed, I am disassociated from that which you worship
translation.id.indonesian: Dan ingatlah ketika Ibrahim berkata kepada bapaknya dan kaumnya: "Sesungguhnya aku tidak bertanggung jawab terhadap apa yang kamu sembah,
